snippet: Kiplinger magazine removed Claremont McKenna from its list of the 100 best values in private colleges on Friday, making it the first ratings agency to do so.
abstract: Kiplinger magazine removed Claremont McKenna from its list of the 100 best values in private colleges on Friday, making it the first ratings agency to do so.
lead_paragraph: 6:46 p.m. | Updated This post was updated to add new content.

headline.main: Kiplinger Removes Claremont McKenna From Rankings
